thread.title: Urban Community School's miracle worker, Sister Maureen Doyle retiring after 34 years
thread.title_full: Urban Community School's miracle worker, Sister Maureen Doyle retiring after 34 years

author: Joanna Connors, The Plain Dealer
title: Urban Community School's miracle worker, Sister Maureen Doyle retiring after 34 years
text: Serving children from 3 years old through eighth grade, the school proves that with enough support, even children from the poorest homes can thrive.
